headline: Polen Global Growth Portfolio Q4 2025 Performance, Attribution & Portfolio Activity
summary: Polen Global Growth Portfolio returned -2.5% in Q4 2025, lagging the MSCI ACWI Index. Read for analysis on new Tencent and Spotify stakes and Oracle's drag.
